title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: Rare 1954 Leica M3 35mm rangefinder camera in excellent working condition with original leather case. One of the most sought-after vintage cameras by collectors.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: Authentic 1965 Gibson SG Standard in cherry red with minor play wear. All original components including PAF humbuckers. Comes with original hard case.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: First-generation Macintosh 128K computer in working condition with original keyboard, mouse, and documentation. Serial number matches all components.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Classic Rolex Submariner stainless steel watch, reference 16610 from 2003. Includes original box, papers, and recent service documentation.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Extremely rare 1925 first edition, first printing with original dust jacket in good condition. One of only 20,000 first prints.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Authenticated Banksy 'Girl with Balloon' screen print from 2004. Number 32/500. Includes Pest Control certificate of authenticity.
